title: Parent Coaching
shortDescription: Training for parents and caregivers in evidence-based strategies to support their child.
description: Parent coaching empowers caregivers with the knowledge and skills to effectively support their child with autism at home and in the community. Trained professionals teach parents evidence-based strategies for communication, behavior management, skill-building, and creating supportive environments. Parent coaching recognizes that caregivers spend the most time with their children and can have tremendous impact when equipped with the right tools.
benefits: Extends therapy benefits to home environment
whoCanBenefit: Caregivers wanting to support therapy at home
Families on waitlists for direct services
Caregivers wanting to build communication skills
